permission.permissionGuide:
Screen recording permission required.

Please follow these steps.
1. Open System Preferences (System Settings)
2. Go to Privacy & Security > Screen Recording
3. Click the lock icon to make changes
4. Click + button and add this app:
   /Applications/Electron.app
   OR drag from node_modules/electron/dist/Electron.app
5. Enable the checkbox
6. Restart this app

Quick access - run in Terminal:open "x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.preference.security?Privacy_ScreenCapture"
